full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DA LTA SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU RNAM PAR DKAR PA'I YON TAN BSOD NAMS BSAGS PA'I GANG ZAG NYIN GYI SKAR MA BZHIN 'GA' ZHIG YOD KYANG, PHYUGS BZHI'I LONGS SPYOD MED NA'ANG STONG STONG MED MED PO ZHES PA'I DBANG GIS RKYEN GYIS MA BYAS KYANG MANG POS NOR GYI LHA RNAMS LAS GANG 'DOD PA'I ZHU BA GA-YANG 'GUGS KYI RIM PA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI MDZAD PA MANG DU YOD KYANG, RNGA MONG GA-YANG SKYABS BLA MA RNAL 'BYOR BA ZHES BYA BA'I MDZAD PA'I SOG SKAD MDOR BSDUS ZHIG LAS GZHAN MED PA'I, BLA MA DE NI GRUB PA THOB PAR ZHIG YIN PAS SNGON NAS SHIS PA 'BYUNG BA'I GSUNGS YIN PAS DE LA THAB LHA BSKYED PA DANG MCHOD PA BSANGS @006B DANG GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS KYI KHA BSKANG TE THUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA CAN RNAMS LA DGOS PA MED NA'ANG 'JIG RTEN PA'I DON GRUB BDAG DANG 'DRA BA DE DGA' LA SKAN PA'I DKAR PA'I SEMS KYIS BSKUL TE, DGE SLONG GZUGS 'DZIN PA SARBA SIDDHI'I MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL LO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
